lines.text: [Kagemaru drops down from a hatch in the ceiling]
You don't have to enter through the ceiling, you know.
I'm sorry, but as an old ninja, I don't really know how to enter from anywhere else.
I'm a woman who's killed all manner of men. Even trumped up little samurai like you! No stray dog is going to give me any cheek!
How did it come to this?
